short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends native messages to Azentio PACI cards Control for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is built to communicate with GCC Kuwait PACI enabled card readers. It will read the ID card details and send these details to the application in JSON format.
